comprehensive_overview: PyQt5 is a comprehensive set of Python bindings for the Qt application framework developed by Riverbank Computing. It allows Python programmers to create desktop applications with rich graphical user interfaces (GUIs) using Qt tools and libraries.
core_features: Integration with Qt Designer for drag-and-drop GUI design
Extensive support for GUI development with widgets, layouts, and events
Cross-platform compatibility with Windows, macOS, Linux, and mobile platforms
Access to a wide range of Qt functionalities including multimedia, networking, and databases
Ability to create standalone executables from Python code
